螌螌螌

螌字的基本解释

螌
bān
〔螌蝥（
m俹 ）〕同“斑蝥”，昆虫，身体黑色，鞘翅上有黄黑色斑纹，关节处能分泌黄色毒液。

螌字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bān］
［《廣韻》布還切，平删，幫。］
见“螌蝥”。

螌字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　螌； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1092第41
【集韻】逋還切，音班。【說文】螌蝥，毒蟲也。【博雅】螌蝥，晏靑也。【本草】一名斑貓，所在有之，長五六分，黃足斑文，鳥腹尖喙。《神農本草經》云：春食芫花爲芫靑，夏食葛花爲亭長，秋食豆花爲螌蝥，冬入地中爲地膽。　又蒲官切，音槃。負螌，臭蟲。通作盤。

螌字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
螌字的起名意思

暂无。

Tart
Basic explanation of words
Tart
bān
〔Tartworm (
m 俹)] Same as "Cantharidae", insect, black body, yellow and black markings on the elytra, and yellow venom can be secreted at the joints.
Tart
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bān］
["Guangyun" cloth still cut, flat cut, help. ]
See "Tartworm".
Tart
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　螌; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1092 Page 41
[Ji Yun] Bu still cut, sound class. [Said the text] Tartare, poisonous insects. 【Bo Ya】Tartworm, Yan Qian also. [Materia Medica] A tabby cat, where it exists, is five or six minutes long, has yellow-footed plaques, and a bird's belly-pointed beak. The "Shen Nong's Materia Medica" states: Spring eats genus genus genus genus genus, summer eats pueraria lobata flower as pavilion long, autumn eats douhua as chrysanthemum, and enters the ground in winter as earth gall.　Pugu Guan cut again, Otopan. Negative tarts, bed bugs. All-in-one.
